metadata.name: Arbitrary File Download Via MSOHTMED.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects usage of "MSOHTMED" to download arbitrary files

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\msohtmed.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('msohtmed.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ftp://')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http://')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('https://'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of "MSOHTMED" to download arbitrary files
